Description: Solid-cast copper alloy ichneumon (or shrewmouse, from long snout) with incised fur-detail; naophorous pedestal with hieroglyphic and demotic inscription.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Curator's comments: Published in: S. Davies and H.S. Smith, The sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, MEES 73, 2005, p. 90-1, pl. XLI
